Episodes.Title: The Blessing Way (2)
Episodes.Plot: Scully finds her career with the FBI in jeopardy as Mulder is still missing and the Cigarette-Smoking Man is pursuing the stolen files. The Navajo elders find Mulder's body in a cave and perform an ancient ceremony to call the spirit back to the empty vessel.
Episodes.GuestStars: Alfred E. Humphreys, Dakota House, Forbes Angus, Mitchell Davies, Benita Ha, Ian Victor, Ernie Foort, Lenno Britos, Tim Michael, Stanley Walsh, John Moore, Martin Evans, Melinda McGraw

Episodes.Title: Paper Clip (3)
Episodes.Plot: A.D. Skinner and Scully are at a standoff when Mulder bursts in and discovers that Skinner has the digital tape. Reunited, Mulder and Scully travel to a secret vault inside a mine and find an elaborate filing system of medical records which reveals that Mulder's sister may not have been the first choice for abduction. Meanwhile, Skinner deals with the Cigarette-Smoking Man for their safety.
Episodes.GuestStars: Walter Gotell, Melinda McGraw, Robert Lewis, Lenno Britos, Martin Evans, Peta Brookstone, Stanley Walsh, John Moore

Episodes.Title: D.P.O.
Episodes.Plot: Mulder and Scully investigate a series of human and cattle deaths by lightning and are led to a teenage boy who is the only survivor out of five people recently hit by lightning strikes.
Episodes.GuestStars: Giovanni Ribisi, Jack Black, Ernie Lively, Karen Witter, Steve Makaj, Peter Anderson, Kate Robbins, Mar Anderson, Brent Chapman, Jason Anthony Griffith, Bonnie Hay, Cavan Cunningham, Aaron Poole

Episodes.Title: Clyde Bruckman's Final Repose
Episodes.Plot: In the midst of a psychic sideshow while on a murder case, Mulder and Scully enlist the help of a man who may have a true psychic ability to foresee how people will die to help the agents catch a man killing fortune tellers.
Episodes.GuestStars: Peter Boyle, Stu Charno, Frank Cassini, Dwight McFee, Japp Broeker, Greg Anderson, Alex Diakun, Karin Konoval, David McKay, Ken Roberts, Doris Rands

Episodes.Title: The List
Episodes.Plot: Nobody takes much notice when a death row inmate vows on the electric chair to come back from the dead and kill five men who have wronged him during his time in prison, until a guard is mysteriously murdered in the former inmate's cell.
Episodes.GuestStars: Bokeem Woodbine, Greg Rogers, Mitchell Kosterman, Paul Raskin, Denny Arnold, Craig Brunanski, Joseph Patrick Finn, Bruce Pinard, Don MacKay, Badja Djola, John Toles-Bey, Ken Foree, April Grace, J.T. Walsh

Episodes.Title: 2Shy
Episodes.Plot: A man with a genetic abnormality who must prey on overweight women in order to suck the fatty tissue from their bodies, begins to meet his victims through internet chat rooms.
Episodes.GuestStars: Timothy Carhart, James Hardy, Catherine Paolone, Glynis Davies, Aloka McLean, Kerry Sandomirsky, Suzy Joachim, Randi Lynne, William MacDonald, Brad Wattum, Beverly Elliot, Dean McKenzie, P.J. Prinsloo, Jan Bailey

Episodes.Title: The Walk
Episodes.Plot: After a suicide attempt and multiple murders at a military hospital, Mulder and Scully meet a quadruple amputee who has gained the power of astral projection and is taking out his personal frustrations on his commanding officers.
Episodes.GuestStars: Thomas Kopache, Willie Garson, Paula Shaw, Deryl Hayes, Rob Lee, Andrea Barclay, Beatrice Zeilinger, Brennan Kotowich, Pat Bermel, Paul Dickson, D. Harlan Cutshall, Don Thompson, Nancy Sorel, Ian Tracey

Episodes.Title: Oubliette
Episodes.Plot: Mulder seeks the help of a woman who he believes has a special connection with a young girl who has recently been kidnapped by the same man who held her captive many years earlier.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tracey Ellis, Michael Chieffo, Jewel Staite, Ken Ryan, Dean Wray, Jacques LaLonde, David Fredericks, Sidonie Boll, Robert Underwood, Dollie Scarr, Bonnie Hay, Alexa Mardon, Eryn Collins

Episodes.Title: Nisei (1)
Episodes.Plot: An investigation into a video of an alien autopsy puts Mulder and Scully in the middle of a conspiracy involving WWII Japanese scientists brought to America to continue their experiments which may shed light on Scully's abduction.
Episodes.Writer: Chris Carter, Howard Gordon, Frank Spotnitz
Episodes.GuestStars: Stephen McHattie, Raymond J. Barry, Robert Ito, Gillian Barber, Corrine Koslo, Paul McLean, Yasuo Sakurai, Lori Ann Triolo, Roger Allford, Carrie Cain Sparks, Bob Wilde, Warren Takeuchi

Episodes.Plot: Mulder is trapped inside a train car which contains a suspected alien-human hybrid and also a bomb, while Scully pursues the truth about her abduction and the mystery behind the implant in her neck.
Episodes.GuestStars: Stephen McHattie, Colin Cunningham, Victoria Maxwell, Sean Campbell, Michael Puttonen, Robert Ito

Episodes.Title: Revelations
Episodes.Plot: Mulder and Scully swap roles as they pursue a man killing priests that claim to have the wounds of Christ. The agents find and must protect a young boy who may be a real stigmatic. While Scully's faith draws her close to the boy, Mulder is convinced of another explanation.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kevin Zegers, Sam Bottoms, Kenneth Welsh, Michael Berryman, Hayley Tyson, Leslie Swan, Fulvio Cecere, Nicole Robert, Selina Williams, R. Lee Ermey, Rhys Huber

Episodes.Title: War of the Coprophages
Episodes.Plot: Widespread panic is caused in a small community after numerous deaths are linked to killer cockroaches, and a government agricultural agency is discovered to have set up a secret experiment involving insects.
Episodes.GuestStars: Bobbie Phillips, Raye Birk, Dion Anderson, Bill Dow, Alex Bruhanski, Ken Kramer, Alan Buckley, Tyler Labine, Norma Wick, Wren Robertz, Tom Heaton, Bobby L. Stewart, Tony Marr, Maria Herrera, Shaw Allen, Dawn Stofer-

Episodes.Title: Syzygy
Episodes.Plot: A rare planetary alignment causes strange behavior in the residents of a small town, but particularly in two teenage girls who were born at the exact same moment on that date.
Episodes.GuestStars: Dana Wheeler-Nicholson, Wendy Benson-Landes, Lisa Robin Kelly, Garry Davey, Ryan Reynolds, Denalda Williams, Gabrielle Miller, Tim Dixon, Ryk Brown, Jeremy Radick, Russell Porter, Jordan Lee Williams

Episodes.Title: Grotesque
Episodes.Plot: A serial killer is captured after a three year manhunt, and he claims an evil spirit is responsible for the crimes. When the killings continue as he sits in jail, Mulder's battle with a former colleague gets more heated when he suggests that something more paranormal may be involved.
Episodes.GuestStars: Greg Thirloway, Susan Bain, Kasper Michaels, Zoran Vukelic, John Milton Brandon, James McDonnell, Paul J. Anderson, Amanda O'Leary, Levani Outchaneichvili, Kurtwood Smith

Episodes.Title: Piper Maru (1)
Episodes.Plot: A French salvage ship searching for a lost WWII fighter plane unknowingly surfaces an alien which appears in the form of black oil and has the ability to jump hosts. Mulder heads to Hong Kong to investigate the salvage broker who sold the information to the French and he encounters Krycek, who has been selling information from the MJ documents. As Mulder prepares to take Krycek back to the US, the alien makes its way to Hong Kong and takes control of Krycek.
Episodes.GuestStars: Robert Clothier, Jo Bates, Stephen E. Miller, Ari Solomon, Paul Batten, Russell Ferrier, Lenno Britos, Kimberly Unger, Rochelle Greenwood, Joel Silverstone, David Neale, Tom Scholte, Robbie L. Maier, Tegan Moss, Da

Episodes.Title: Apocrypha (2)
Episodes.Plot: Mulder pursues Krycek (unaware of  the alien that has taken over his body) to get back the DAT tape containing the MJ documents. Meanwhile, the shooting of A.D. Skinner uncovers evidence that could lead Scully to her sister's murderer.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kevin McNulty, Sue Mathew, Barry Levy, Lenno Britos, Frances Flanagan, Peter Scoular, Jeff Chivers, Martin Evans, Harrison Coe, Craig Warkentin, Richard Hersley, David Kaye, Stanley Walsh, Eric Breker, Dmitry Chepo

Episodes.Title: Pusher
Episodes.Plot: Mulder and Scully are asked to help in a case involving Robert Patrick Modell, a murderer possessing the psychic ability to force his will onto people. Due to a brain tumor that is slowly killing him, he is searching for a "worthy adversary" and forces Mulder into a battle of mind over matter.
Episodes.GuestStars: Julia Arkos, Roger R. Cross, Steve Bacic, Don MacKay, Brent Sheppard, D. Neil Mark, Meredith Bain Woodward, Ernie Foort, Darren Lucas, Janyse Jaud, Henry Watson, Robert Wisden, Vic Polizos

Episodes.Title: Teso Dos Bichos
Episodes.Plot: The unearthing of an ancient Ecuadorian Amaru urn and its removal to America despite protests leads to a series of deaths linked to a shaman spirit released by the urn.
Episodes.GuestStars: Vic Trevino, Janne Mortil, Tom McBeath, Gordon Tootoosis, Ron Suave, Alan Robertson, Garrison Chrisjohn

Episodes.Title: Hell Money
Episodes.Plot: The deaths of several Chinese men found to be missing vital internal organs that were removed prior to death leads Mulder and Scully to a deadly Chinatown lottery where men wager their body parts for a chance to win a cash jackpot.
Episodes.GuestStars: B.D. Wong, Michael Yama, Lucy Liu, James Hong, Doug Abrahams, Stephen M.D. Chang, Donald Fong, Diana Ha, Paul Wong, Graham Shiels, Ed Hong-Louie

Episodes.Title: Jose Chung's 'From Outer Space'
Episodes.Plot: A alien abduction of two teenagers with endless versions of the same story prompts a science-fiction novelist to to write a book about the incident; however, nobody involved with the investigation can tell him the full story with any accuracy.
Episodes.GuestStars: Charles Nelson Reilly, William Lucking, Larry Musser, Daniel Quinn, Jesse Ventura, Jason Gaffney, Sarah Sawatsky, Allan Zinyk, Alex Diakun, Andrew Turner, Michael Dobson, Japp Broeker, Alex Trebek

Episodes.Title: Avatar
Episodes.Plot: During a one-night-stand in the midst of his divorce, A.D. Skinner becomes a murder suspect, and Mulder and Scully return the many favors that he has done for them by analyzing evidence that someone doesn't want uncovered to prove his innocence.
Episodes.GuestStars: Amanda Tapping, Malcolm Stewart, Tasha Simms, Stacy Grant, Janie Woods-Morris, Cal Traversy, Bethoe Shirkoff, Tom Mason, Jennifer Hetrick, Piper Anderson

Episodes.Title: Quagmire
Episodes.Plot: Mulder and Scully investigate a series of disappearances and attacks around a lake where Mulder believes that the local legend about a lake monster may be all too real.
Episodes.GuestStars: Timothy Webber, Chris Ellis, R. Nelson Brown, Mark Acheson, Peter Hanlon, Tyler Labine, Terrence Leigh, Murray Lowry, Nicole Parker

Episodes.Title: Wetwired
Episodes.Plot: After a man kills three people and his wife because he mistook them for a ruthless middle eastern dictator, Mulder and Scully discover a test involving mind control using television signals that make people's worst fears become real in any form.
Episodes.GuestStars: Colin Cunningham, Tim Henry, Linden Banks, Crystal Verge, Joe Maffei, John McConnach, Joe DeSorro, Heather McCarthy, Zinaid Memisevic, Sandy Tucker, Andr√© Danylieu

Episodes.Title: Talitha Cumi (1)
Episodes.Plot: Mulder and Scully search for a mysterious man with the power to heal. His actions risk exposing the existence of aliens on Earth, while a confrontation between Mrs. Mulder and the Cigarette-Smoking Man leads Mulder to the discovery of the only weapon which can kill the aliens.
Episodes.GuestStars: Brian Thompson, Angelo Vacco, Hrothgar Mathews, Stephen Dimopoulos, John McLaren, Cam Cronin, Bonnie Hay, Brian Barry, Ross Clarke, Roy Thinnes
